import React from 'react' import { MdClear } from "react-icons/md"; const CoinSpec = ( icon, coinName, symbol, price, volume, priceChange24, marketcap, cur, id ) => { return (

{coinName}

{symbol.toLocaleString().toUpperCase()}

{currency}{price}

{currency}{volume.toLocaleString()}

{priceChange24 < 0 ? (

{priceChange24.toFixed(2)}%

) : (

{priceChange24.toFixed(2)}%

)}

{currency}{marketcap.toLocaleString()}

) } export default CoinSpec
